text: Danny Phantom is an American animated superhero television series that ran on Nickelodeon from April 3, 2004 to August 24, 2007. ==Series overview== Season Episodes Originally aired First aired Last aired 1 20 2 20 3 13 ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2004–05)=== ===Season 2 (2005–06)=== ===Season 3 (2006–07)=== ==Short films== ==References== ;General * ;Specific Danny Phantom
